input.description: years ago the Earth was formed
input.excerpt:
For instance, invasive Burmese pythons have caused a 98% decline of small mammals in the Everglades.
The Earth was formed approximately 4.5 billion years ago. As it cooled and a crust and oceans formed, its atmosphere transformed from being dominated by hydrogen to one composed mostly of methane and ammonia.
